poem:
In the Shadow of Power

A dance of shadows  
across the American stage;  
figures in flesh  
and rhetoric's cruel grip.  
Here, kindness wears  
its soft armor,  
while ambition,  
steel-clawed,  
strikes at the heart  
of its mirror.  
Two visions;  
the soil of one nation  
fed  
by the clamor  
of their silent battle.
